description: Get the runtime information that was logged for a specific runtime instance of the workflow step.

parameters.name: stepExecutionId
parameters.description: Use the unique identifier for a specific runtime instance of the workflow step to get runtime details for that step.

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: stepExecutionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the runtime version of the workflow step that you specified in the request.

nested_items.name: workflowBuildVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the build version for the Image Builder workflow resource that defines this workflow step.

nested_items.name: workflowExecutionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier that Image Builder assigned to keep track of runtime details when it ran the workflow.

nested_items.name: imageBuildVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image resource build version that the specified runtime instance of the workflow step creates.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the specified runtime instance of the workflow step.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The name of the action that the specified step performs.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status for the specified runtime version of the workflow step.

nested_items.name: rollbackStatus
nested_items.description: Reports on the rollback status of the specified runtime version of the workflow step, if applicable.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The output message from the specified runtime instance of the workflow step, if applicable.

nested_items.name: inputs
nested_items.description: Input parameters that Image Builder provided for the specified runtime instance of the workflow step.

nested_items.name: outputs
nested_items.description: The file names that the specified runtime version of the workflow step created as output.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the specified runtime version of the workflow step started.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the specified runtime instance of the workflow step finished.

nested_items.name: onFailure
nested_items.description: The action to perform if the workflow step fails.

nested_items.name: timeoutSeconds
nested_items.description: The maximum duration in seconds for this step to complete its action.
